title: After drift school
description: Fresh back from Drift 101 Matt Farah and Thaddeus Brown share their experience, Jeff Glucker (@JGlucker) drops by to swap stories, Zack Klapman accidentally does everything wrong while getting pulled over in a circa 1979 Chevy van and we all lament the cesspool that is the Autoblog comment section
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
